analyzed: dge slong dag /

analyzed: sems can la byams pa /

analyzed: sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste /

analyzed: yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams la byams pa sgom par byed do //

translated: He sat there with a mind full of love for all the people living in his country. By the power of that, no one was able to harm any sentient being at all.

translated: “Whose power is it that in this land we are not able to steal the splendor of anyone, even those in the animal realm?” They asked the cowherds and shepherds,

analyzed: kye / gang gis yul 'dir su la'ang gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi nus pa 'di su'i mthu yin /

translated: He sits there with a mind full of love for all the many people who live in his country. Because of his power, no one in this country can do any harm at all.”

original: gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsam pa /
analyzed: gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsam pa /
translated: The yakṣas thought,

analyzed: rgyal po de ni /
translated: “This king

analyzed: bsod nams can che bar grags pa /
translated: is renowned for his great merit,

analyzed: byams pa'i bdag nyid can /
translated: is of a loving nature,

original: snying rje che ba /
analyzed: snying rje che ba /
translated: is very compassionate,

original: sems can la byams pa zhig ste /
analyzed: sems can la byams pa zhig ste /
translated: and loves sentient beings.🔽There is no doubt that he will be able to satisfy us.”

analyzed: de'i tshe tshong pa lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /

analyzed: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //

analyzed: rab tu byung nas kyang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /

translated: “By this root of virtue, may we please and not displease Uttara, the young brahmin prophesied by the totally and completely awakened Buddha Kāśyapa to be the next blessed buddha.”

analyzed: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so // dge slong dag /

translated: “Monks, what do you think?

original: tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te /
